tests.author: Norbert Lindenberg
tests.description: Tests that language tags are canonicalized in return values.

tests.author: Norbert Lindenberg
tests.description: Tests that appropriate fallback locales are provided for supported locales.

tests.author: Norbert Lindenberg
tests.description: Tests that Unicode locale extension sequences do not affect whether a locale is considered supported, but are reported back.

tests.author: Norbert Lindenberg
tests.description: Tests that canonicalization of locale lists treats undefined and empty lists the same.

tests.author: Norbert Lindenberg
tests.description: Tests that non-objects are converted to objects before canonicalization.

tests.author: Norbert Lindenberg
tests.description: Tests that locales that are reported by resolvedOptions  are also reported by supportedLocalesOf.

tests.author: Norbert Lindenberg
tests.description: Tests that LookupSupportedLocales includes the default locale  and doesn't include the "no linguistic content" locale.

tests.author: Norbert Lindenberg
tests.description: Tests that language tags with invalid subtag sequences are not accepted.

tests.author: Norbert Lindenberg
tests.description: Tests that the behavior of a List is not affected by adversarial changes to Array.prototype.

tests.author: Norbert Lindenberg
tests.description: Tests that a single string instead of a locale list is treated  as the locale list containing that string.

tests.author: Norbert Lindenberg
tests.description: Tests that structurally valid language tags are accepted.

tests.author: Norbert Lindenberg
tests.description: Tests that values other than strings are not accepted as locales.

tests.author: Norbert Lindenberg
tests.description: Tests that the behavior of a Record is not affected by adversarial  changes to Object.prototype.

tests.author: Norbert Lindenberg
tests.description: Tests that the behavior of a List is not affected by adversarial changes to Array.prototype.

tests.author: Norbert Lindenberg
tests.description: Tests that the option localeMatcher is processed correctly.

tests.author: Norbert Lindenberg
tests.description: Tests that the array returned by SupportedLocales is extensible, but its properties are non-writable/non-configurable.

tests.author: Norbert Lindenberg
tests.description: Tests that the behavior of a Record is not affected by adversarial  changes to Object.prototype.

tests.author: Norbert Lindenberg
tests.description: Tests that default locale is available.

tests.author: Norbert Lindenberg
tests.description: Tests that language tags with "_" are not accepted.

tests.author: Norbert Lindenberg
tests.description: Tests that LookupSupportedLocales returns an empty list when given an empty list.

tests.author: Norbert Lindenberg
tests.description: Tests that the default locale is a String value representing the structurally valid and canonicalized BCP 47 language tag.

tests.author: Norbert Lindenberg
tests.description: Tests that canonicalization of locale lists removes duplicate language tags.

tests.author: Norbert Lindenberg
tests.description: Tests that toLocaleString handles "this Number value" correctly.

tests.description: Tests that Number.prototype.toLocaleString uses the standard built-in Intl.NumberFormat constructor.

tests.description: Tests that Number.prototype.toLocaleString throws the same exceptions as Intl.NumberFormat.

tests.author: Norbert Lindenberg
tests.description: Tests that Number.prototype.toLocaleString produces the same results as Intl.NumberFormat.

tests.author: Norbert Lindenberg
tests.description: Tests that Number.prototype.toLocaleString meets the requirements for built-in objects defined by the introduction of chapter 17 of the ECMAScript Language Specification.

tests.description: Tests that Intl has Object.prototype as its prototype.

tests.description: Tests that the options numeric and caseFirst can be  set through either the locale or the options.

tests.author: Norbert Lindenberg
tests.description: Tests that missing Unicode extension values default to true for boolean keys.

tests.description: Tests that constructing a Collator doesn't create or modify unwanted properties on the RegExp constructor.

tests.author: Norbert Lindenberg
tests.description: Tests that the option usage is processed correctly.

tests.author: Norbert Lindenberg
tests.description: Tests that the option ignorePunctuation is processed correctly.

tests.author: Norbert Lindenberg
tests.description: Tests that Intl.Collator can be subclassed.

tests.author: Norbert Lindenberg
tests.description: Tests that Intl.Collator instances have the specified properties.

tests.author: Norbert Lindenberg
tests.description: Tests that Intl.Collator does not accept Unicode locale  extension keys and values that are not allowed.

tests.commentary:
10.1.2 Intl.Collator ([ locales [ , options ]]) 
 17 ECMAScript Standard Built-in Objects:   Every built-in Function object, including constructors, that is not   identified as an anonymous function has a name property whose value   is a String. 
   Unless otherwise specified, the name property of a built-in Function   object, if it exists, has the attributes { [[Writable]]: false,   [[Enumerable]]: false, [[Configurable]]: true }.
tests.description: Intl.Collator.name is "Collator".

tests.author: Norbert Lindenberg
tests.description: Tests that the options numeric and caseFirst are processed correctly.

tests.author: Norbert Lindenberg
tests.description: Tests that the option localeMatcher is processed correctly.

tests.author: Norbert Lindenberg
tests.description: Tests that the option sensitivity is processed correctly.

tests.author: Norbert Lindenberg
tests.description: Tests that the this-value is ignored in Collator.

tests.author: Norbert Lindenberg
tests.description: Tests the special handling of the "co" key in Intl.Collator.

tests.author: Norbert Lindenberg
tests.description: Tests that the behavior of a Record is not affected by adversarial  changes to Object.prototype.

tests.author: Norbert Lindenberg
tests.description: Tests that non-object values passed as this to Collator are ignored and a normal collator object will be initialized and returned.

tests.author: Norbert Lindenberg
tests.description: Tests that objects constructed by Intl.Collator have the specified internal properties.

tests.author: Norbert Lindenberg
tests.description: Tests that Intl.Collator.prototype has the required attributes.

tests.author: Norbert Lindenberg
tests.description: Tests that Intl.Collator.prototype meets the requirements for built-in objects defined by the introduction of chapter 17 of the ECMAScript Language Specification.

tests.author: Norbert Lindenberg
tests.description: Tests that Intl.Collator.prototype functions throw a  TypeError if called on a non-object value or an object that hasn't been initialized as a Collator.
Tests that Intl.Collator.prototype is an object that  has been initialized as an Intl.Collator.

tests.author: Norbert Lindenberg
tests.description: Tests that the compare function supports different sensitivity settings.  This test is not normative.

tests.author: Norbert Lindenberg
tests.description: Tests that the getter for Intl.Collator.prototype.compare meets the requirements for built-in objects defined by the introduction of chapter 17 of the ECMAScript Language Specification.

tests.author: Norbert Lindenberg
tests.description: Tests that the compare function isn't entirely unreasonable.  This test is not normative.

tests.author: Norbert Lindenberg
tests.description: Tests that the function returned by Intl.Collator.prototype.compare  returns 0 when comparing Strings that are considered canonically equivalent  by the Unicode standard.

tests.author: Norbert Lindenberg
tests.description: Tests that the compare function supports phonebook sorting if it says it does.  This test is not normative.

tests.commentary:
10.3.3 get Intl.Collator.prototype.compare 
 17 ECMAScript Standard Built-in Objects:   Every built-in Function object, including constructors, that is not   identified as an anonymous function has a name property whose value   is a String. 
   Unless otherwise specified, the name property of a built-in Function   object, if it exists, has the attributes { [[Writable]]: false,   [[Enumerable]]: false, [[Configurable]]: true }.
tests.description: get Intl.Collator.prototype.compare.name is "get compare".

tests.author: Norbert Lindenberg
tests.description: Tests that the function returned by Intl.Collator.prototype.compare meets the requirements for built-in objects defined by the introduction of chapter 17 of the ECMAScript Language Specification.

tests.commentary:
10.3.3 get Intl.Collator.prototype.compare 
 ... 4. If collator.[[boundCompare]] is undefined, then   a. Let F be a new built-in function object as defined in 10.3.4.   b. Let bc be BoundFunctionCreate(F, collator, « »).   c. Perform ! DefinePropertyOrThrow(bc, "length", PropertyDescriptor {[[Value]]: 2, [[Writable]]: false, [[Enumerable]]: false, [[Configurable]]: true}).   d. Set collator.[[boundCompare]] to bc. ...
tests.description: The bound Collator compare function is an anonymous function.

tests.author: Norbert Lindenberg
tests.description: Tests that compare function is bound to its Intl.Collator.

tests.author: Norbert Lindenberg
tests.description: Tests that the object returned by Intl.Collator.prototype.resolvedOptions  has the right properties.

Let bf be BoundFunctionCreate(F, dft, « »).   c. Perform !
